name: Alien's Eggs
overview: Alien's Eggs is an arcade action game for one or two players. The player controls a spaceship divided into three parts, that can move horizontally on the bottom of the screen and fire vertically upwards. The player encounters alien eggs, that hatch when shot into a variety of creatures that descend and fire upon the player. The player's shop has three parts, and a new part is used when the previous is destroyed. The player starts with a single cannon, progresses to two cannons close together, and then finally two cannons further apart. The game ends when all stages of he ship are destroyed.
